titles: The unconquerable, all-conquering, & more-then-conquering souldier, or, The successful warre which a believer wageth with the enemies of his soul as also, the absolute and unparalleld victory that he obtains finally over them through the love of God in Jesus Christ : as it was discussed in a sermon preached at Boston in New-England, on the day  of the artillery-election there, June 3d., 1692 / by Urian Oakes ...
author: Oakes, Urian, 1631-1681.
Shepard, Thomas, 1635-1677.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
